Bont is the world’s largest manufacturer of inline skates. We design, manufacture, and have perfected a range of inline skates for beginners through to speed skates for elite skaters. Additionally, as a manufacturer, we can create custom speed skates in as little as eight weeks!

t: Welcome to Bont Cycling | Bont Cycling
s: Bont Cycling is dedicated to producing the world's most technically advanced and anatomically correct cycling shoes. Bont Cycling offers shoes for road cycling and racing, triathlon, track cycling, off-road mountain biking and custom cycling shoes.
